Bash(git -C /Users/tomcranstoun/Documents/GitHub/fixEcalendar tag -a v1.3.0 -m "Release v1.3.0

Major Features:
- File Status Report for tracking problematic PST files
- Automatic overlapping event merge with time prefix normalization
- Process ALL calendar folders in PST files (breaking change from v1.2.x)
- Birthday/anniversary pattern fixes for RFC 5545 compliance
- Yearly BYDAY pattern enhancements with BYMONTH parameter

Code Quality:
- Reorganized utilities into src/utils/ directory
- Removed legacy CLI (src/index.ts) for simplified codebase
- Unified database-backed approach (src/index-with-db.ts)
- Updated all documentation and imports

Bug Fixes:
- Enhanced calendar folder detection with PR_CONTAINER_CLASS
- Fixed nested calendar folder processing
- Improved data preservation with UNCERTAIN DATE marking
- Better handling of corrupted recurrence patterns

See CHANGELOG.md for complete details.")
